website_summaries.verdict: A premium crib wedge with an extra firm, high-density foam inner for optimal support.
pros: High density foam delivers excellent support and doesn’t lose shape in a hurry
Handcrafted cotton cover is hypoallergenic and washing machine safe
cons: A small percentage of users felt waterproof inner cover was too crinkly
Incline might not be adequate for severe reflux

website_summaries.verdict: Works equally well in a crib or toddler bed, and some parents use it to help babies with reflux enjoy lying in their play gym.
pros: This high-density foam wedge features a 12-degree incline
Non-skid bottom keeps wedge in place
cons: Some reported that their babies slid off the wedge too easily

customer_reviews.title: Very mice
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with my doctor before purchasing to be sure it was okay and she said yes, a 12 degree incline was the correct position for a baby. I’m very happy with this wedge. My little guy (6 weeks old) has a cold, so having him inclined and swaddled has really helped his sleep. I appreciate the honesty of the company in describing their product and that they urge you to speak with your doctor beforehand. Your child’s safety is more important than their making a profit and I appreciate that. This is my 2nd baby but the first time I’ve ever fealt with any issues needing a wedge support and I’m very happy to have found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sv

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with a great elevation
customer_reviews.text: Great pruduct with a perfect height. It is higer than competitors and works great for babies who suffer from reflux or nasal congestion. However, my baby keeps rolling down from the pillow and waking up during the middle of the night. Other than that it is a good quality and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: All of my babies have been big spitter uppers and need to sleep at an incline to prevent choking and to sleep more comforatably. I use a rock n' play bassinet when they're first born because of it's great incline but then transitioning them to a flat crib is always an adjustment. I'm expecting my 4th soon and bought this wedge in preparation for that transition. My two year old is using it now until baby gets here and she's been pretty excited about it and keeps repeating "It's cozy!".
customer_reviews.author: Nathan N

customer_reviews.title: Works for reflux
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my two month old son who is having reflux problem This one is waterproof and attached well on the crib bed and works good for reflux problem But my baby slide over this bed because of the elevation When i put him on the top of this bed,he comes to the end while sleeping and playing it really works good for reflux After i used this for my baby ,reflux REDUCED while he sleeps on it
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Helps with reflex
customer_reviews.text: My baby had reflexes when she was under 4 months. She would get disturbed in her sleep due to the reflex and start coughing or crying. This wedge gave an elevation for her head and we could visibly see her sleep better with it. It also helped on days when she had a blocked nose. Having a elevation made sure her airways are free.
customer_reviews.author: Subha

customer_reviews.title: Great amount if incline for a 2.5 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was diagnosed with vertigo and she would often have morning episodes due to rising from flat to sitting. This gives her just enough lift without causing her to roll or slide. Still is able to use her standard size pillow. Easily fits under the fitted sheet. Does not come in box as pictured. It comes folded in half. I did not notice any permanent issues due to the folding that others have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic crib wedge!
customer_reviews.text: I had used the OCCObsby bassinet wedge for my daughter’s acid redflux / stuffy nose and when I recently moved her to the crib I was thrilled to find a crib wedge by the same company! The wedge stays in place, is super comfortable, easy to clean and is very high quality. I am thrilled to have found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wenger

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for babies that like an incline.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 7 month old. He likes to sleep in the fisher price rocker but we know that can't last forever. This isn't as steep but at least provides an incline to help make him more comfortable. I'm very pleased with the wedge and I would buy it again! I wish I would've bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: bridge

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great so far.
customer_reviews.text: In both a pack and play and under a crib mattress when we wanted to elevate our little one's head. We don't use this all the time, but have found that it helps him sleep when he has congestion or other ailments where elevation would be nice - without adding senseless risk to his sleeping situation.
customer_reviews.author: Web Geek

customer_reviews.title: Our son sleeps in the crib now
customer_reviews.text: Man, my son just would not sleep in his crib. Then we bought this wedge. It's amazing. He sleeps so much longer on it at a time and can comfortably move from his back to side to tummy without waking himself up because his face is buried in the mattress. It's also really helpful for drool and runny noses.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: works great, positioning is key
customer_reviews.text: since getting this, my baby falls asleep more quickly and spits up less when laying down. Do be careful not to put your baby too high up on it, though, or they will roll off sideways in their sleep
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Transitioning
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My baby tends to spit up, but he sleeps comfortably with this under his crib mattress. I think it also helped the transition from sleeping in a rock-and-play to the crib go smoothly (instead of suddenly having to lay flat).
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with ordering the wrong product and Andrea went above and beyond to help me, excellent customer service. The wedge is a good material and nice quality. It fits easily in my bassinet. The wedge arrived early and was well packaged. My baby has only tried it out during the day so we will see how sleeping goes.
customer_reviews.author: KS1919

customer_reviews.title: Love that it seems to help LO sleep better throughout the night
customer_reviews.text: seems to help my LO sleep better when his nose is stuffy.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnbkrmark

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I got it for our LO since he has cold and bad cough for 3 weeks since he was struggling to breathe at night but since we got the crib wedge he can spend 3 hours sleeping now. Worse every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I know you are supposed to place this under the blanket however my son kept rolling off of it at night. I put it under the mattered and the issue is resolved. My son has GERD or reflux and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft and nice. My son loves to take his bottle or drink alot more when he is very sleepy/ laying down. The wedge provide the incline positin that I needed when he is eating while laying on his bed. It fits the standard size crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: very useful!
customer_reviews.text: This wedge is great! We place it under doc-a-tot, in the crib and pack-n-play for sleeping, and under the kick & play for play time. This seems to help with acid reflux. Of course we always pay attention to our baby, while using it. We purchased another to keep upstairs for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: LakePen

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow and a must have for a baby.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great, It very soft and plush. It came in a vacuum sealed bag and when I first unrolled it and removed it from the packaging I was worried that it would not every fully inflate and take shape. After about 3 days, it was fully expanded. I love that this pillow is water proof and that the cover can be taken off for cleaning. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to use as added bolstering in a recliner chair. I knew I would have to cut it up to use it, but in the process I discovered that this is a really well-made quality product. The cover has some depth to it that makes it very soft. The comfort cover and the waterproof cover were both fitted snugly and neatly. All in all a very nice product. I think a baby would like it too!
customer_reviews.author: LouieL

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflux babies.
customer_reviews.text: My son has reflux and has been sleeping in the pack and play. We were trying to prop up the legs but provided extra strain and made the changing pad unusable. This has helped him a lot and I can transfer to different beds quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Map259

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For those with reflux babies this will be your best friend. The company was really kind to work with as well for which I’m extremely grateful! reading the other reviews confused me at first because everyone complained that the wedge comes folded. It does. It’s really absurd on the sellers part but it doesn’t actually cause any issues with using the product so I would not lower a review for that reason. It’s more so just annoying. The wedge was the perfect angle for my refluxy baby to have a great nights sleep with minimal spit up issues
customer_reviews.author: Coral Denakis

customer_reviews.title: Great wedge minus the sliding down
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for our little one spitting up while laying flat. It has made a huge difference in his sleep pattern because he's finally getting more rest. The only thing I don't like about this wedge is that baby slides down in the middle of the night and sometimes is turned to the side. It makes me nervous and I would not use it if we didn't have the AngelCare monitor that detects movement. Other than that, I'm thankful for a lot less puke covered blankets & sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: less spit ups and sleeps better!
customer_reviews.text: This has been very helpful with my LO's reflux. less spit ups and sleeps better!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Our son had a hard time falling asleep on the cribs firm mattress (which we know is best for babies), but this slight incline and the right amount of softness, allowed our son to easily transition into the crib. It also helps with reducing spit-up. I recommend this to a friend. The only thing I’m disappointed about is when I washed the removable cover, it shrunk a bit and now the slim edge of the wedge is a bit rounded and misshapen. Thankfully our son is transitioning off of the wedge so I’m not too worried.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and packaged nicely. Love this and it was such a great investment for us!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This may work for some babies, but our baby is a very active sleeper and moves a lot. So when we tried to use this, he just rolled off and turn sideways every time. Although he does have some reflux, turns out he sleeps better without the wedge. For some that have less active babies with severe reflux, I could see this working. It was nicely manufactured and looks comfy for baby. The very thinnest edge is not completely flush with mattress - a little bump of elevation. Not sure if that would bother some babies.
customer_reviews.author: KConrad87

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my 6 month old baby, just because he always seemed so comfy in our bed with our pillows so i thought it was time to make him a bit more comfortable in his crib and this was a great choice, I just inserted under his crib fitted sheets and he loves it!! and the best part is that the height is just perfect for a baby! it doesn’t make me nervous or concern about his safety
customer_reviews.author: JennOrtiz

customer_reviews.title: Not just for infants - Great support for my 81 year old dad
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow wedge to reposition my dad who had a stroke and is bed-bound. It gives him relief when place under his back, legs or bottom. I also use it as a foot extension under his feel so when he is more comfortable at night. The wedge holds it shape without compromising comfort. His skin is fragile so it offers protection against undue friction. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: sm-2cents

customer_reviews.title: Helped us a lot
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had very bad reflux that kept her up at night. She could not sleep on a flat surface. We used this wedge pillow under her crib mattress for a month. Our daughter was finally sleeping and not waking up every 5min. At two months her reflux got better, we did not need the pillow anymore. But I am happy we got it bc it helped us a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Egle

customer_reviews.title: Solved our newborn sleep problems, pronto!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is dealing with milk allergy, soft larynx muscles that causes breathing difficulty laying down flat and reflux. The incline of this wedge was just enough to help her be very comfortable asleep. Quality fabric, design and fit perfectly. Excellent and responsive customer service, definitely small family run business feel with A+ attention. Bought both crib and bassinet wedges and will use once at daycare soon. Her doctors approved for use immediately and consider it safe for use/back to sleep. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is pretty fussy when there are changes to her life, including bedding. (She’s veeeeery detail-oriented) ;-) She easily transitioned to using this! It is helping with her allergy congestion too. It’s soft, easy to add to bedding, yet elevated enough to help with congestion. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnibear77

customer_reviews.title: Helped immediately!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow helped reduce (and nearly eliminate) my baby spitting up in his crib with the first use. Very thankful for this product as it has helped save me from having dirty, spit up sheets and having to change them all the time. Soft, comfortable and fits easily under a standard fitted sheet. I haven't had to clean it yet (thanks to less spit up!), but I'm sure that process is fairly easy. I do worry about my baby rolling down from his position sometimes, but if he's in a swaddle, he'll stay in position. He will roll down and move around if not swaddled, but I just keep an eye on him and readjust him if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Pou

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I purchased this sooner. I got this for my now 1year old who has refused to sleep on her back since birth! This wedge changed all that. She doesn't mind sleeping on her back when the wedge is in place. If you are wondering if this is worth the buy....it is! Purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This fit in my sons mini crib with one of the sides a litrle squished but gave that great elevation for my sons acid reflux! The price is a little high
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and avoid a reflux on baby
customer_reviews.text: You must buy this if you dont want a baby with a lot of reflux. Even if you just feed a baby you can be mire confident tonlay them down because the small incline angle avoids possible spit ups. I suggest that after the baby starts moving more with time then use it under supervision because they can start to wiggle and move sideways in the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Fits a pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my baby was spitting up a lot in the hopes this would help in case it was acid reflux. I can’t say that I’ve noticed much of a difference, but it feels a lot more comfortable than the hard pack n play may she sleeps on.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good night sleep for all!
customer_reviews.text: My l.o. sleeps on this wedge every night. He had to Allen in an inclined sleeper due to reflux and he will obstruct (close off his airway) if laying flat. This has been a miracle worker getting him to finally sleep through the night in his own bed. Yes he can wiggle down in the bed. This wedge fits snuggly from side to side of his crib so entrapment is not a concern. It has worked so well we just ordered a second one to keep at my mom’s house. It does come with a soft easy to wash cover. I have actually put the wedge under the fitted sheet so there is no concern of moving.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wedge pillow for all
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wedge pillow for infant acid reflux. Fits into the pack and play and crib fully along the width. Perfect fits in each.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Crib wedge=safety first
customer_reviews.text: I love how the crib wedge elevates my baby's head. It's just enough to prevent spit ups and improve her breathing as she sleeps at night. Would definitely recommend for that matter. I do wish it was a little softer or thinner right at the edge (part that ends up on her mid back). Although, our little one didn't seem to mind and I was pleased that she slept through the night and had no spit ups or heavy breathing. Safety first! Overall, such great product, would buy again for sure :)
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how this would be, but it fits perfectly under my baby’s crib mattress and provides a small elevation when he sleeps. I’ve only used it 1 night so I’m not 100% sure how the baby is adjusting to it but I shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for more than just acid reflux.
customer_reviews.text: My son is suffering from really bad allergies and i was trying everything because he wasn't sleeping and neither was I. Originally, I had a pillow under his crib mattress but it created an incline for the whole mattress so he was sliding all the way down. With this wedge, it fits under the sheet and at most he will roll himself off it or end up like he is now. It has been a blessing though because it keeps him elevated enough that he can breathe. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Helps calm baby to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Ok so have a 4yr old no issue now we have a 3 week old and has really bad colic, gas, spits up and grunts and arches his back all night we tried different sleep areas, food, clothing, gripe water and gas drops nothing worked with this wedge 95% better his first night cant believe it was simple trust me working parents get it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Herszman

customer_reviews.title: Helped our reflux baby sleep!
customer_reviews.text: We got this crib wedge after we transitioned our baby from the bassinet to the crib. We had previously used tho occo baby bassinet wedge. Works great! We put it under the entire mattress to help with our babies reflux. He would not sleep lying flat so this was extremely helpful to get him to sleep!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Money

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: We had initially purchased a wedge through Walmart, but decided on this one instead. So far, so good. It is soft and fits perfectly under our crib mattress, but it does first need to be "aired out" to get max softness. We have yet to put our baby in the crib to use it, but anticipate that there will be zero issues or concerns. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: vaymer

customer_reviews.title: ... when he actually stays on the pillow it works great, but the reality does not
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 months and when he actually stays on the pillow it works great, but the reality does not. He tosses all over his crib and will end up at the laying below the pillow. Probably would have worked better when he was a bit younger. I have noticed it does help stay asleep when I place him after nursing or rocking him. I wish there was some way I hold him on the pillow through the night. I think this will only work for 0-3 month babies who stay in one place, normally they are still in their bassinets at that age. I don't think its worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Adults can use this as well
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a acid reflux pillow that I could use with my standard pillow on top of , this gives me all the lift I need to help with acid reflux at night because the pillow is same size as top pillow nothing shifts around . Great product .
customer_reviews.author: Becky Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for our baby
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this but it wasn't really for us. The angle wasn't steep enough to help with our baby's reflux. But the quality was solid, the pillow was firm. Our baby would roll off of it after about 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: adam kazansky

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Place it under mattress. Honestly it doesn’t matter if you buy an expensive one or not if you are putting it under the mattress. The soft cushion won’t touch his head... but if I need to use it somewhere else, it’ll be great!
customer_reviews.author: lea everett

customer_reviews.title: Great for GER!
customer_reviews.text: Helped with my daughter's GER. She is a wiggler though and she sometimes slips off of the pillow. It was an easy fix by just positioning her a little lower on the pillow. I would highly recommend this pillow for anyone with a baby with GER or acid reflux! Always remember to ask your pediatrician first before buying something that promotes anything other than baby laying flat on their back. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jade and David

customer_reviews.title: Worthy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect angle, fits well under a crib sheet for the most part. My daughter uses this an it allows her to move comfortably, acting as a replacement for a pillow in her crib. Over all good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Size do not fit all
customer_reviews.text: It is publicized as a universal wedge that fits most cribs, i got it before buying a crib as my pediatrician recommended getting a wedge for my infant to help his reflex issue. I got an IKEA standard crib but the wedge did not fit! I stress on buyers to check measurements and NOT misled by the one size fits all or most slogan!
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: Good crib wedge
customer_reviews.text: Placed under the mattress helped us a lot baby stopped crying. It took one day to adjust later he slept well. Only thing he is sliding down so we need thick sheet to stop sliding
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my daughter so much, she was spitting up a lot to the point where I was concerned to lay her flat. Very easy to wash and place under fitted sheet. Now I sleep more comfortably knowing that if she were to spit up she isn’t lying flat potentially choking on it. She now sleeps 4-5 hours in a row at two months of age. Would recommend to everyone who has a baby that doesn’t sleep much throughout the night! Definitely saw the difference in one night!!
customer_reviews.author: AnaMaria Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Too short to prop entire body
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely a wedge, it fits the standard crib, and it works well under the sheet, its just that the length of the wedge is only enough if the baby is fully propped at the top, and she usually slips down a little, naturally, so it ends up that the wedge is propping her neck up instead of her body. No bueno.
customer_reviews.author: DGraham

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Retuned. Baby rolled down wedge and even tried under mattress and rolled down bed. Was 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Timm

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my little one when she has a cough to keep her head slightly elevated. While I just started using it, it does appear to already be helping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 month old son had terrible acid reflux. With the suggestion of our pediatrician we purchased this pillow. Now, with the help of the pillow, medicine and a change in diet he's doing much better. Before these changes he was only napping 1-2 hours all day. Now he's sleeping 3-5 hours during the day. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Except For Gravity
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but when our baby girl would move around she’d eventually roll to the bottom of the crib. Not the products fault, just gravities.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Helped my baby sleep better
customer_reviews.text: My LO had trouble sleeping because his system hasnt matured enough to hold milk when full so he easily wakes up and grunts and chokes then throws up whenever he is laid flat. So I tried this pillow and he slept really really well! This pillow is heaven sent! I gave 4 stars because foam isnt a high quality one but does the job. PS I do recommend for mommas to ask your pedia first!
customer_reviews.author: adrien edora

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I feel so much more comfortable knowing my baby is slightly elevated for naps/sleeping and hasn't had as much spit up since using this wedge pillow. We keep it under the mattress so I haven't needed to clean it yet, but I'm very happy with it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KB Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflux babies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of getting my month old baby to tolerate laying on his back without screaming from reflux. We love it and he sleeps really good now. We put it under his mattress to help him not slide down so much. We also love the incline for the occasional time he does spit up during the night, its easily is expelled and the spitup doesn't just sit directly on him.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen Gasser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for my baby. It helps prop him up just enough for his reflex issue and helps when he has a cold to prop his head at just the right angle for drainage. I love how it fits under the mattress sheet so there is not worry about it moving around. Easy to clean. The product does come with a 2 yr warranty and they make it SO EASY to set that up! Definitely would recommend this product for any momma!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: This pillow wedge is awesome. It fits in the baby crib without an ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow wedge is awesome. It fits in the baby crib without an issue. Baby sleeps comfortably on it and did not have any re flux problems. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Em D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised by how nice these wedges look. I bought to use with a standard Delta crib. The wedge fits under the mattress perfectly and provides just the right amount of lift. I also bought the bassinet wedge and both are as described and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great crib and pack n play Wedge
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this for the first time yesterday. I put it under the pack n play Mattress and it gave a nice comfortable elevation to the head of the bed. My baby slept well.
customer_reviews.author: Annabell

customer_reviews.title: The customer service is very responsive and will help you get your pillow just “right” for you.
customer_reviews.text: I havent had the opportunity to use my pillow for many nights to be a fair judge of the product yet. My pillow needed to be customized for perfect comfort and the customer service was amazing. The company was very prompt in their response to me. My pillow now feels like it will be perfect but I need to sleep on it awhile to say for sure.
customer_reviews.author: patricia desanto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for any baby with reflux!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I purchased because my daughter was 14 months at the time and she was waking up in the middle of the night with the smell of acid on her breath or because she spit up. After a lot of research I chose to purchase this product. I placed it underneath her crib mattress and it elevates her head of bed perfectly. It helped tremendously with my daughters reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is recommended by my friend. Buy it at a discount. Baby after use do not have to worry about milk spilt, and is wide enough to baby rolling is not afraid. It can also help him sleep on his side and prevent him from rolling over. Mom is really a good helper, with it a lot easier, the baby sleep is very comfortable and soft. It's a very recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: Tiramisu

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an infant with congestion
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product when my pediatrician told me it would help with the congestion my 4 month old had been experiencing. As someone who is terrified of SIDS, I was apprehensive when using it, but I must say, its very easy to use and very safe. I place it underneath the fitted sheet in his pack and play and propped him up for sleep and all was well. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality just didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality pillow & soft outer cover and just the right amount of incline but it didn’t work for our baby as she just kept rolling off of it. I wanted to use to elevate my babies head when she is sick so the mucus can drain easier but she is just too rolly polly
customer_reviews.author: Erica Young

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this to help with my GERD, I have placed it under my normal pillow and it keeps me tilted at night. It has helped with the GERD and so far I have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the wedge this week at daycare. The ladies in the nursery say he is resting well and no spit up accidents. Seems to be just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my little one. He has acid reflux and I was in search of something to be able to prop him up on. This product is awesome. You can slide it right underneath the crib sheet and it matches up perfectly with the sides of the bed. So he cannot roll to the side and get caught in between the crib and pillow. So far my little one loves it and it’s super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! Our baby loves it too!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Easy to wash and soft on baby's face/head. Also helped with her congestion at night and problems sleeping when sick. Would buy it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jessia Stathos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect elevation
customer_reviews.text: This product is been the answer to my prayers for my baby to be able to sleep comfortably. The elevation is just perfect for him to be able to breathe better. I was a little hesitant about buying this one as I was confused with all the different choices but I’m so happy I got it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alegna_pr

customer_reviews.title: Good for playpen
customer_reviews.text: We use a playpen instead of a crib for baby. This fit great. Gave us peace of mind that baby wouldn't spit up. It's been a few months. No spit up. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: London's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Use this for acid reflux!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a review on an acid reflux pillow for adults, I followed their advice and bought a baby wedge. I cut off the plastic as it crinkles, and put the nice zip fabric cover on. Threw on a pillow case of my own, and it worked great with two of my pillows. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my three week old grandson. His parents really liked it and put it in his crib right away
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has helped with my son’s breathing by elevating him. He has sinus issues and laying flat causes him to wake up a lot in the night coughing. This pillow was just enough elevation
customer_reviews.author: Njjenn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. I haven't had much time to evaluate before writing this review, however, based on the limited time I've had it thus far I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: My son has acid reflux and this helps us with peace of mind that he will be okay sleeping
customer_reviews.author: BunnehGirl

customer_reviews.title: The texture of the material is good
customer_reviews.text: The texture of the material is good. Too bad it's still not helpful with my son's reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a loved one that was in a rehab center, it is comfortable, easy to clean and the perfect incline. We liked it so much we purchased 2 more and now sleep with them under our pillows for that slight elevation.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Great wedge very portable
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use and travel with crib we’d ge. Before we even used it somehow we got something on the cover in the car- no problem, removed it washed it and back on it went. My son slept soundly on his Wedge. We use it for travel and daycare
customer_reviews.author: Wolf lover

customer_reviews.title: Review enabled by sleeping baby
customer_reviews.text: This is only day one, but my stuffy 7 week old with reflux has spent multiple hours napping in his crib. This is baby number two and I have never had an infant sleep this comfortably in their crib during the day. The wedge is worth the purchase price just for our restful day today!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the noise it makes
customer_reviews.text: My baby doesn't like it because it makes the flimsy noise. I have washed the cover so couldn't return it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CARINA

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have worked
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for our baby so we returned but the item was excellent quality. Glad there were free returns so we could try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my son and he sleeps really well, he has bad acid reflux and this has helped a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So soft & comforting for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my newborn daughter and I absolutely love it. Very baby soft, easy to clean and has definitely helped her sleep. Would make a great baby gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice not too tall wedge
customer_reviews.text: I use it to raise my head slightly to help me breath easier at night.
customer_reviews.author: bdipietr

customer_reviews.title: All of the Reviews were very accurate and helpful in my decision to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my son had been sick and needed the additional support for elevation when he slept, this came within two days of my order which was ideal and all of the reviews I read were very accurate. He is now sleeping more peacefully without having any congestion issues and I feel that the product is very safe, clean and perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: D.DiDo

customer_reviews.title: Not only for babies
customer_reviews.text: I'll confess I didn't buy this for a baby but for myself. I put it under my pillow as the perfect wedge to help with my sinus problems. Its just the right amount of lift.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's waaayy too short and too soft not even much of a incline either.
customer_reviews.author: NANi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for putting under my pillow for a correct head and neck position. It served its purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Re

customer_reviews.title: Great for a newborn baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the arrival of my new grandson. The truth is that the product is soft, comfortable and seems easy to clean. I like the idea of ​​using it as a kind of pillow so that the baby does not lie flat on the bed but with a slight inclination.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is nice for laying baby down after eating but he can't lay flat yet. Good balance of softness and support.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Travassos

customer_reviews.title: Extra sleep
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to see if it’ll help my baby sleep on his back. Unfortunately he still prefers sleeping on his stomach, but with my cubby cove lounger on top of the occo baby makes me feel better bc he’s inclined and on a very breathable fabric. He’s sleeping an extra 2 hours as well. So we like it.
customer_reviews.author: danielle vagnier

customer_reviews.title: Great for congestion
customer_reviews.text: My poor little one is congested and this has made such a difference in his sleep. Only thing I’m upset about is waiting so long to order it.
customer_reviews.author: s.minton

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wedge the only downside is if you have a squirmy baby or if your little one like to toss and turn, they will slide down the wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

product_meta.title: OCCObaby Universal Baby Crib Wedge Pillow with Removable Waterproof Cotton Cover
feature_bullets: OCCObaby Universal Baby Crib Wedge Pillow is designed with the doctor-recommended 12 degree incline which safely elevates your baby's head to improve sleep, reduce spit-ups, and relieve congestion.
This pillow has a removeable waterproof, hypoallergenic cover is easily cleaned with warm water and soap. The cover is skid, odor, mold, and bacteria-resistant, so your pillow will stay clean.
All elements to this product are free from harsh chemicals, BPA, phthalates, formaldehyde, lead and PBDEs. It's designed with comfort and your baby in mind.
The pillow wedge is made from high density foam to keep your baby comfortable and safe all night long.
The pillow is universal for all sizes and styles of cribs and toddler beds. The wedge is 27.3" in length and has anti-skid features , designed for a secure, stationary fit under any fitted sheet.
